quote: The problem is, you talk, but you don't get anything done, Hillary. You don't. Just like when you ran the State Department, $6 billion was missing. How do you miss $6 billion? You ran the State Department, $6 billion was either stolen — they don't know. It's gone, $6 billion. If you become president, this country is going to be in some mess. Believe me.
quotePlain: The problem is, you talk, but you don’t get anything done, Hillary. You don’t. Just like when you ran the State Department, $6 billion was missing. How do you miss $6 billion? You ran the State Department, $6 billion was either stolen — they don’t know. It’s gone, $6 billion. If you become president, this country is going to be in some mess. Believe me.
name: Donald Trump

checks.quote: The $6 billion figure comes from a State Department inspector general report that found paperwork for various contracts had been mismanaged. The $6 billion was not missing or stolen — it had been doled out in a number of contracts — but the paperwork was missing.
checks.quotePlain: The $6 billion figure comes from a State Department inspector general report that found paperwork for various contracts had been mismanaged. The $6 billion was not missing or stolen — it had been doled out in a number of contracts — but the paperwork was missing.

claims.title: $6 billion went missing, possibly stolen, from State Department
claims.negative: $6 billion is not missing, possibly stolen, from State Department
claims.negativePlain: $6 billion is not missing, possibly stolen, from State Department
claims.truth: That figure refers to funds for contracts with insufficent paperwork.
claims.truthPlain: That figure refers to funds for contracts with insufficent paperwork.
